content.body: Wiki's dead?

Can infra tuples be destructured? Ie:

Set (body, type) to the result of extracting init.

Where "extracting init" returns a tuple of (body, type)

content.body: annevk: On that note, I split out the "body with type" changes from fetch#1392 into https://github.com/whatwg/fetch/pull/1439. It's purely editorial, so should be relatively easy to land :)

content.body: in this case someone filed a urlpattern-polyfill bug because they expected `[]` in pathname to be encoded like `encodeURI()` does, but we follow URL spec and do not encode that
